mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT e.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT mq.counseltitle, mq.counselcontent, mq.iscounselanswer, mq.regdate, ma.counselanswercontent, ma.medicounselanswerseq AS seq, ma.answertime, ma.helpedcount, u.userid, u.userSeq, d.departmentname, dc.doctorname, h.hospitalname FROM tblmedicounselingquestion mq INNER JOIN tblmedicounselinganswer ma ON mq.medicounselquestionseq = ma.medicounselquestionseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tblUser u ON u.userseq = mq.userseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tbldepartment d ON d.departmentseq = mq.departmentseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tbldoctor dc ON dc.doctorseq = ma.doctorseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tblhospital h ON h.hospitalid = dc.hospitalid ORDER BY mq.regdate DESC ) e ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tblmedicounselingquestion mq INNER JOIN tblmedicounselinganswer ma ON mq.medicounselquestionseq = ma.medicounselquestionseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tblUser u ON u.userseq = mq.userseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tbldepartment d ON d.departmentseq = mq.departmentseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tbldoctor dc ON dc.doctorseq = ma.doctorseq LEFT OUTER JOIN tblhospital h ON h.hospitalid = dc.hospitalid
mapper.insert: insert into tblmedicounselingquestion (mediCounselQuestionSeq, userSeq, departmentSeq, counselTitle, counselContent, isCounselAnswer, regdate) values (seqMediCounselingQuestion.nextVal, #{userseq}, #{departmentSeq},#{counseltitle},#{counselcontent},default,sysdate)
insert into tblMediCounselingBox (mediCounselBoxSeq, userSeq, mediCounselAnswerSeq) values (seqMediCounselingBox.nextVal, #{userSeq}, #{medicounselanswerseq})
mapper.select: select mq.counseltitle, mq.counselcontent, mq.iscounselanswer, mq.regdate, ma.counselanswercontent, ma.medicounselanswerseq, ma.answertime, ma.helpedcount, u.userid, u.userSeq, d.departmentname, dc.doctorname, h.hospitalname from tblmedicounselingquestion mq inner join tblmedicounselinganswer ma on mq.medicounselquestionseq = ma.medicounselquestionseq left outer join tblUser u on u.userseq = mq.userseq left outer join tbldepartment d on d.departmentseq = mq.departmentseq left outer join tbldoctor dc on dc.doctorseq = ma.doctorseq left outer join tblhospital h on h.hospitalid = dc.hospitalid where d.departmentseq = #{departmentSeq} order by mq.regdate desc
